type.title: Type

was corrected.

value_date.title: Value Date
value_date.description: When the taxes of this invoice become accountable, if none set, the issue date is used.

supplier.title: Supplier
supplier.description: The taxable entity supplying the goods or services.

customer.title: Customer

notes.title: Notes
notes.description:

legal details.

meta.title: Meta
meta.description: Additional semi-structured data that doesn't fit into the body of the invoice.

seller.title: Seller

useful for B2C retailers with customers who prefer final prices inclusive of
tax.

meta.title: Meta
meta.description:
Any additional data that may be required for processing, but should never
be relied upon by recipients.
